name: SaveBrexit (1day prototype)
description: Game Summary: SaveBrexit is a prototy[e of Intelligent Sniper Project. In “Intelligent Sniper” you play as CIA sniper on mission in foreign cities of Europe. You’ve just got the brief for your targets. Your only tools are sniper sight and trigger, so search for a target and don’t hesitate to shoot, because clocks are ticking. And for god’s sake, don’t be distracted by funny situations in your sight drawn by Frans le Roux.
